      • submitProfile

        public java.lang.Boolean submitProfile(java.lang.String username,
                                       java.lang.String password)
        Submit new user with given username and login. Fails if username already exists.
        Parameters:
        username - new username
        password - new password
        Returns:
        true if the user was created, false otherwise.

      • submitBuildings

        public void submitBuildings(java.util.ArrayList<com.trogdadr2tr.resources.Building> buildings,
                            int mapID)
        Given an Arraylist of buildings will insert the buildings into the database. DO NOT send repeats ie. if a building was in a previous arraylist remove it before calling again.

      • grabBuildings
